txt.en: 'You have helped a great deal, [placeholder], and I thank you for it! I believe all will be well now. Surely there are others you might help!'\n\nYour thoughts travel to Gandalf, and your heart pulls you towards the Westfold -- the westernmost area of the Westemnet, the gate that holds the enemy at bay. You should hasten to that land at once.
You should seek Gandalf in the Westfold.
You believe that Gandalf can be found in the centre of the Westfold, perhaps on the road.\n\nYou should seek Gandalf.

'How did you know I would be here, [placeholder]? It is no matter -- there is no time! I will thank providence for this happy coincidence, and leave it at that.\n\n'Come, we have much to discuss, and quickly!'
